Class ADLXNative

Namespace
ADLXWrapper
Assembly
ADLXWrapper.dll

Manual P/Invoke declarations for ADLX DLL entry points. These functions are exported from amdadlx64.dll and must be loaded dynamically.

public static class ADLXNative
